subject: My Dear friend,
body:
My Dear friend,
I'm happy to inform you about my success in getting those funds
transferred under the cooperation of a new partner from India,
Presently I'm in India for investment projects with my own share of
the total sum.
meanwhile,i didn't forget your past efforts and attempts to assist me
in transferring those funds despite that it failed us some how.
Now contact my secretary
His name is Mr Kiki Roymond
Email:  
kikiroymond@hotmail.com
Ask him to send you the total of USD800,000.00 which i kept for your
compensation for all the past efforts and attempts to assist me in
this matter. I appreciated your efforts at that time very much. so
feel free and get in touch with my secretary and instruct him where to
send the amount to you.
Please do let me know immediately you receive it so that we can share
the joy after all the suffering at that time. in the moment, I'm very
busy here because of the investment projects which me and the new
partner are having at hand, finally, remember that I had forwarded
instruction to the secretary on your behalf to receive that money, so
feel free to get in touch with Kiki Roymond on
(
kikiroymond@hotmail.com
) he will send the amount to you without any delay.
Yours Faithfully
Dr Raul Benzi From India

subject: Re:   My Dear friend,
body:
Dear Dr. Raul Benzi,

I am glad to hear about your success in India and I appreciate your kind gesture. However, you didn't provide any contact details for Mr. Kiki Roymond. Could you please provide his email address or phone number so that I can get in touch with him?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jose

subject: Re: Attention
body:
Attention,

I am in receipt of your mail and note the content under instruction of my boss and be informed that the cashier's cheque worth of Eight Hundred Thousand Dollars is here with me written on your name which was left to me to deliver to you on request.

Your information is highly needed Send Your Address, Your Phone number and Your Full Name to me so I will send the cheque to your Address immediately.

Am waiting to hear from you as soon as you get this message with your full address for the delivery.
Regards,

Mr. Kiki Roymond

Call me +229 50797304
